query:
SELECT 
  'campaign' as type, 
  c.id, 
  c.name, 
  c.slug 
FROM campaigns c 
WHERE c.slug = 'besta'
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'team' as type,
  t.id,
  t.name,
  CAST(t.campaignId AS CHAR) as slug
FROM teams t
WHERE t.name IN ('Palmeiras', 'Santos');
